document.full_text: actor jeff conaway, best known for his roles in the movie "grease" and the 1970s tv series "taxi", died on friday at the aged of 60, his manager said.
document.title: "grease" and "taxi" actor jeff conaway dies at 60
lines_and_colors: actor jeff conaway, best known for his roles in the movie "grease" and the 1970s tv series "taxi", died on friday at the aged of 60, his manager said.
